name: Plant-Based Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wraps
description: Thank you, Tracey Van Der Valk, for this plant-based recipe!

ingredients.name: Nourish Broth Mix or Vegetable Broth Mix
Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning or Chicken Fried Rice Seasoning

preparation:
1. In Multipurpose Steamer, place rice, 2 cups water and broth mix; cover. Microwave 6 min, then set aside in a separate bowl.  
  2. In Multipurpose Steamer, place seasoning, meat substitute, peppers, mangoes, remaining 1 tbsp water, sesame oil, and soy sauce. Gently mix to combine. Microwave, 6 min.  
  3. Meanwhile, cut lettuce into four wedges, remove stem ends and gently peel the wedge leaves off two at a time to create strong, sturdy, crunchy boats for your filling.  
  4. Layer rice, then protein mixture on lettuce. Top with extra toppings, if desired.
tips: Swap plant-based meat substitute with 1 can (19 oz/540 ml) chickpeas, drained and rinsed.
